StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetFYNumVisitsSMCR]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @FiscalYear as integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
SELECT
suve.[SMCRUnitVisitEventID],suve.[Organiza.onEventID], oe.[Organiza.onID], oe.[FiscalYear], SMCRReserveUnitName AS SMCRUnitName, [NumPlannedVisits] AS NumFYPlannedVisits, [ContractGoal] AS NumFYContractGoal
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRUnitVisitEvent] suve INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON oe.Organiza.onEventID = suve.Organiza.onEventID INNER JOIN Recrui.ng_organiza.on ro ON ro.Organiza.on_id = oe.[Organiza.onID]
WHERE oe.[Organiza.onID] = @Organiza.onID and oe.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
